alert.note: Alert for Collin; Dallas; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 10:28AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Rockwall, southern Collin and northeastern Dallas Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1027 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Richardson, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Plano, Garland, Richardson, Allen, Rowlett, Wylie, Rockwall, Sachse, Murphy, Royse City, Heath, Fate, Lucas, Parker, Farmersville, Mobile City, Lavon, McLendon-Chisholm and St. Paul. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 61 and 79. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
